editorialSummary.text: Cosy rooms in a functional lodging offering complimentary breakfast & Wi-Fi, plus a gym & a pool.

text.text:
The hotel offers a perfect blend of luxury and comfort. Rooms are spacious, clean, and hygienic, with a premium feel throughout. The food is absolutely delicious whether you opt for room service or dine-in, every meal is a treat.

What truly stands out is the hospitality. The staff is incredibly friendly, courteous, and attentive, making sure your stay is seamless and stress-free. The hotel also offers great amenities, including a well-maintained gym, which adds to the experience.

A special highlight is the stunning view of the racecourse and the horses a rare and beautiful sight right from your room. Whether you're in town for work or leisure, Holiday Inn Bangalore is a top-tier choice that offers great value and an elevated stay experience.

Highly recommended!

text.text:
I had an absolutely wonderful experience during my stay at this hotel. From start to finish, everything was smooth, comfortable, and impressively well managed.

The staff greeted me with genuine smiles and made me feel welcome right away. Check-in was quick.

The room was immaculate and beautifully designed. The bed was soft and cozy, the linens were fresh, and the overall vibe was peaceful—perfect for winding down after a long day.

The breakfast buffet was especially satisfying. Great taste. Well served by Debkanta.
Special thanks to chefs, food was really tasty.

They also decorated the room for the birthday the memory they came to know about it. Fantastic hospitality service.

This hotel exceeded my expectations in every way. It’s a perfect choice for both business and leisure travelers looking for comfort, great service, and thoughtful hospitality.

text.text:
The food at the hotel is genuinely good and probably the best part of the stay. However, the rest of the experience was Okay. The room provided was quite small and not worth the price.

The management was overly money-minded, constantly insisting on advance payments—even for bookings over two days—which felt unnecessary and pushy. On top of that, they have very rigid policies: guests are not allowed to visit, and outside food is strictly prohibited. These restrictions made the stay feel more like a controlled environment than a comfortable hotel experience.

Overall, I wouldn’t recommend this place unless you’re just going for a quick meal.

text.text:
Terrible Experience – This Hotel Is Anything But “Grand”

My stay at Hotel Grand Kalinga in Bangalore was extremely disappointing. The moment we arrived, we noticed a strong stench in the lift and the room. The bed sheets were smelly and clearly not fresh, the room was unhygienic, and the closet was broken and unusable.

The so-called "complimentary breakfast" was a joke — there were just a few bread crumbs left with no refills in sight. Despite multiple guests requesting more food, the staff didn’t respond. When we politely asked about it, the manager came out and behaved rudely, shouting at us and others, saying we should have come at 8 AM. This was shocking, especially since we were told at check-in that breakfast would be available until 10:30 AM — we arrived at 9:30, well within that time.

The manager’s attitude was unprofessional and disrespectful. His rude behavior and lack of basic courtesy were unacceptable and set a terrible tone for our stay. This hotel may have “Grand” in its name, but it was anything but. I strongly advise avoiding this place — it's not worth your time or money.

24hrs hot water facility is available. Evenings and mornings in balcony were just awesome.

text.text:
Disappointed with Our Stay – Major Service Failures

Our experience at The Grand Magrath Hotel, Bangalore was extremely disappointing. Despite clearly indicating that we were vegetarian, the hotel sent us non-vegetarian food — not once, but twice during our stay. This kind of negligence is absolutely unacceptable, especially in the hospitality industry where dietary preferences must be respected without compromise.

To make matters worse, we had specifically booked a king-size bed in advance, yet were given a twin-bed room despite being a married couple. This clearly shows a lack of attention to detail and complete disregard for guest preferences, even with a confirmed booking.

For a hotel that claims to be premium, this level of service and carelessness is shocking. We expected better and will certainly not be returning — nor would we recommend it to others who value basic respect and professionalism.

text.text:
A Convenient yet Imperfect Stay
I recently stayed at this hotel during my official visits, and the location is indeed its strongest suit. It's situated in a very convenient spot, making it easy to access key areas of the city.

The Good
- *Convenient Location*: Perfect for business travelers or those who need to be close to major hubs.
- *Budget-Friendly*: Offers great value for the price, making it an excellent choice for those on a budget.
- *Decent Breakfast*: The breakfast spread is satisfactory and provides a good start to the day.

The Not-So-Good
- *Maintenance Issues*: The rooms, particularly the bathrooms, lack proper maintenance. During my last stay, I noticed a significant decline in cleanliness.
- *Bathroom Cleanliness*: The bathrooms were not up to the mark, with cockroaches spotted in the toilets. This is unacceptable and needs immediate attention.

Suggestions for Improvement
- *Enhance Housekeeping*: Regular and thorough cleaning of rooms, especially bathrooms, is essential to maintain hygiene standards.
- *Pest Control*: Implement effective pest control measures to prevent cockroaches and other pests.

Overall
Despite the issues with maintenance and cleanliness, this hotel remains a good option for those who prioritize convenience and affordability. With some improvements in housekeeping and pest control, it could easily become a top choice for budget-conscious travelers. I hope the management takes my feedback seriously and works on addressing these concerns.

text.text:
"Hotel from Hell" is not an exaggeration. My stay here was a series of disappointments, starting with the tiny, claustrophobic room that barely fit our luggage, let alone three guests.
The staff’s attitude was appalling. We requested extra water bottles, only to be met with arguments. They insisted only 1 litre per room was complimentary—even for three guests—and anything more would be chargeable. Nowhere was this policy written or communicated. I had to escalate the issue via my travel agent’s customer care before they reluctantly handed over extra bottles—accompanied by more unnecessary arguments and condescension, as if I hadn't stayed in hotels across five countries.
The hostility was unnerving, and I, a female traveler, genuinely felt unsafe. If I’d been travelling alone, the situation could have escalated further.
Housekeeping was equally disappointing: no daily linen changes, despite repeated requests. Basic courtesy—like offering breakfast a few minutes early so we could catch our airport transfer—was flatly denied. Breakfast starts at 7:30 AM; we had to leave at 7:35. No flexibility, no empathy.
Unprofessional, inhospitable, and unsettling. Avoid this hotel if you value comfort, service, or basic human decency.

text.text:
Our stay at Vivanta, Residency Road, Bangalore, was extremely disappointing and far from the standards we expect from the Taj group.

1.	Poor Technical Support – The technicians had absolutely no knowledge of how to connect the WiFi or resolve the TV issues. We spent over two hours with continuous disturbance from the technician, only to eventually resolve the issue on our own. The Samsung Android TV provided in the room seems to be just for show.
2.	Substandard Amenities – The bathroom amenities were shocking for a Taj property. They provided cheap ₹5 soaps instead of a proper handwash bottle. Even after multiple requests, they didn’t provide handwash and instead sent more small soaps.
3.	Unresponsive Reception – Nobody answers calls at the reception, making even basic communication a hassle.
4.	Delayed Room Service – Any food order takes over 45 minutes to arrive, which is highly inconvenient.
5.	Overall Service Experience – The service quality is far below Taj standards. From the very first day, the experience was pathetic, stressful, and disappointing. Despite paying for 8 days upfront, the first day itself left us dissatisfied and regretful of our choice.

We had high expectations from Taj, but our experience at Vivanta, Residency Road, has been extremely disappointing. I would not recommend this property to anyone.

⸻

I strongly recommend avoiding this hotel.

text.text:
Top-Notch Care and Hospitality

During our recent stay at The Leela Palace Bangalore for the Keysight Conference, we had the pleasure of being assisted by Nathaniel, one of the butlers at the hotel. From the moment we arrived, Nathaniel went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and convenience.

He was attentive, thoughtful, and incredibly professional throughout our stay. Whether it was helping us with last-minute requests, guiding us through the property, or ensuring we had everything we needed during the conference, Nathaniel handled everything with grace and efficiency. His warm demeanor and attention to detail truly enhanced our experience at the Leela.

It’s rare to come across someone so genuinely committed to guest service. Nathaniel is a true asset to The Leela Palace, and we’re grateful for the care and hospitality he extended to us.

Highly recommended!

text.text:
I had a wonderful stay at The Leela Palace Bangalore. From the moment I arrived, the warm and welcoming hospitality stood out. The rooms are spacious, beautifully designed, and equipped with all the modern amenities you’d expect from a luxury property. I especially enjoyed the serene views and the lush greenery surrounding the hotel—perfect for a peaceful walk outdoors.

text.text:
Disappointing Experience at The Leela Palace, Bangalore

I recently visited The Leela Palace for an event and was quite disappointed by the overall experience, especially considering it’s a 5-star property.

Rude staff behavior: On arrival, while searching for the restroom and event venue, I was misdirected twice. A staff member (appeared to be a manager) rudely yelled at us once he realized we were from the event, saying we weren't allowed in that area.

No place to work: I had an urgent office call and couldn’t find a place to sit in the event area. When I moved to the garden, security asked me to leave. At the reception area, I was forced to sit on the floor. Staff kept rudely shooing us away without suggesting a proper spot to work from.

Inadequate facilities: Only one washroom was available for a large crowd. It became dirty quickly, with no prompt cleaning. Paint was peeling in several areas, which was surprising for a hotel of this stature.

For a premium hotel hosting corporate guests, the lack of courtesy, basic amenities, and professionalism was very disappointing.

text.text:
@meenakshi,@venkat,@dileep
I stayed at Trinity Suites Hotel for 10 days, and my experience was absolutely wonderful. From the moment we arrived, the staff welcomed us warmly and even carried our luggage. In the evenings, they would speak with us respectfully and kindly, showing genuine hospitality.
The breakfast was delicious, and the staff went the extra mile – if we forgot to have breakfast, they would call and remind us! We came from Hyderabad and, as this hotel is in Bangalore, we didn’t know the local languages, but they patiently helped us find good food places nearby.
A special mention to Dillep, Meenakshi, the property manager Venkat, and the entire team – all were extremely kind and helpful. The room was spacious, very clean, and beautifully decorated with photo frames depicting old traditions, which added a lovely charm to the stay.
Overall, the workers were friendly, maintained the rooms very neatly, and made our stay feel like home. I would happily give them a full 5 out of 5 stars. Highly recommended!

text.text:
My stay at Holiday Inn, Racecourse was fantastic. The hotel's location was perfect, overlooking the Race Course and surrounded by lots of trees.

The rooms and service were top-notch, just like you'd expect from this hotel chain. I asked for a specific room that I'd stayed in before, and the staff I talked to at the hotel's call desk was really helpful. They made sure I got the room I wanted, which was a nice touch.

I want to give a shout-out to a few people who made my stay even better. The buffet breakfast at Cafe G was delicious, and the staff there were so dedicated. The chef even remembered how I liked my mini-pancakes, which was a nice surprise.

The front door staff were really helpful too. They took care of my luggage and had it ready for me when I needed it. Braison at the front desk was super helpful with my reservations and remembered all my room preferences.

Even though no one escorted me to my room, it was okay because it was a busy day. But Aman from Cafe G and Sahid from Housekeeping went out of their way to make me feel welcome. They were both friendly and helpful.

I also want to mention Prasanjit and Nitish from the In-Room Dining Staff. They were both really nice and made sure I had everything I needed during my stay. And the Alfredo Pasta from The In-Room Dining Oriental Box was amazing, it was a special request and I had it every day! And it was one of the reasons I chose this hotel again for my R&R stay.

Overall, my experience at Holiday Inn, Racecourse was great. The beautiful surroundings, excellent service, and tasty food made it a memorable stay. I'll definitely be coming back here for my future trips.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Holiday Inn Bengaluru Racecourse Road, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience! From the moment I checked in, I felt like I was in good hands.

The rooms were spacious, clean, and beautifully appointed, with all the amenities I needed for a comfortable stay. The beds were cozy, and the linens were crisp and clean. I particularly appreciated the attention to detail in the room decor and the modern facilities.

The food at the hotel was outstanding! The menu offered a great variety of options, and the quality of the dishes was consistently high. I enjoyed the breakfast buffet, which had a wide range of options to suit all tastes.

But what truly made my stay special was the exceptional hospitality. Akanksha Kumari, in particular, went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

Overall, I would highly recommend the Holiday Inn Bengaluru Racecourse Road to anyone looking for a comfortable and memorable stay in Bangalore. The combination of excellent rooms, delicious food, and outstanding hospitality makes it a truly special place.

Thanks, Akanksha, for making my stay so special!

I will definitely stay here on my next visit to Bangalore.

text.text:
Exquisite Luxury and Impeccable Service: A Heavenly Experience at The Oberoi, Bangalore

Rating: ★★★★★

The Oberoi, Bangalore is an exceptional haven of opulence, where luxury seamlessly intertwines with warm hospitality. My recent stay at this magnificent hotel left an indelible impression, and I am thrilled to share my appreciation for its unmatched service, breathtaking ambiance, and unrivaled attention to detail.

Upon entering the grand lobby, I was immediately captivated by the hotel's timeless elegance. The tasteful interior design, featuring a perfect blend of contemporary aesthetics and traditional Indian motifs, exudes a sense of refined sophistication. The Oberoi, Bangalore undoubtedly sets the stage for a truly unforgettable experience.

The rooms at The Oberoi, Bangalore redefine luxury living. From the moment I stepped into my suite, I was enveloped in a world of comfort and tranquility. The meticulous attention given to every detail, from the plush bedding to the captivating city views, spoke volumes about the hotel's commitment to excellence. The spaciousness of the room allowed me to unwind in absolute serenity, making it an ideal retreat after a long day of exploration.

What truly sets The Oberoi, Bangalore apart is its remarkable service. The staff's unwavering dedication to ensuring guest satisfaction is second to none. Every encounter was characterized by warmth, attentiveness, and a genuine desire to create a memorable experience. From the friendly concierge who offered invaluable suggestions for local attractions to the diligent housekeeping staff who kept my room immaculate, the team at The Oberoi, Bangalore exceeded my expectations in every way.

Dining at The Oberoi, Bangalore is an absolute delight for the senses. The hotel boasts a range of exceptional restaurants, each offering a distinctive culinary experience. Whether savoring Indian delicacies at the award-winning "Rim Naam" or indulging in global flavors at "Le Jardin," the culinary expertise on display was simply phenomenal. The exquisite presentation, impeccable service, and the use of the finest ingredients showcased the hotel's commitment to culinary excellence.

The Oberoi, Bangalore also houses a state-of-the-art spa and fitness center, where I had the opportunity to rejuvenate both body and mind. The spa's serene ambiance, coupled with a wide array of rejuvenating treatments, left me feeling utterly refreshed and pampered. The fitness center, equipped with top-of-the-line equipment, provided a perfect opportunity to maintain my wellness routine while enjoying the luxurious surroundings.

Situated in the heart of Bangalore, The Oberoi's location is ideal for both business and leisure travelers. Its proximity to prominent landmarks and commercial districts ensures easy accessibility, while the hotel's serene environment shields guests from the city's hustle and bustle.

In conclusion, The Oberoi, Bangalore is a true gem that offers an unforgettable luxury experience. Its impeccable service, breathtaking ambiance, and unwavering commitment to guest satisfaction set it apart from the rest. I wholeheartedly recommend this remarkable hotel to anyone seeking an indulgent retreat in the vibrant city of Bangalore.

text.text:
At first the hotel may seem a little aged but after a while you really think of it as an elegant patina. However for me the standout was the old school service. Every interaction mattered, from the greeting that every person gives, to how the wait staff clears your plates efficiently during meal service, to the individual good byes from the staff, there is a real professionalism and pride here at this hotel.

Even the fact that they organised and arranged my cables cleanly and then provided a screen cleaner, this level of dedication is so encouraging because to me it’s lost in so many of the hotel chains. Yes it may not be as large or as grand or as new as some other places but it was lovely hotel and I had a memorable stay.

text.text:
Exceptional Stay Experience at Vivanta by Taj, Bangalore.Residency road

Dear Team,
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional service and a memorable stay my family and I experienced during our visit to Bangalore from July 7th to July 11th.

From the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed by your attentive staff, who went above and beyond to ensure our comfort. The check-in process was smooth, and our room was beautifully appointed, providing a perfect oasis to relax after our busy days exploring the city.

The Breakfast buffet dining experience was outstanding and loved the lay out and the variety. Each meal was a delightful journey of flavors, and the staff’s recommendations were spot on. We especially loved Ragi Dosa and the morning bakery items.

What truly stood out was the personalized service of Restaurant Manager Sandip Singha and floor HK supervisor Suresh/ Rujula. Every staff member we encountered was friendly, professional, and eager to assist, making us feel valued throughout our stay.

Thank you once again for making our visit to Bangalore so special. We look forward to returning to Vivanta by Taj on our next trip!

Warm regards,

Sonali Vinod
GM Clarks Inn
Lucknow.

text.text:
The Chancery Hotel presents itself as a refined and elegant accommodation option, aiming to provide a sophisticated stay for its guests 🏨✨. The hotel typically features well-appointed rooms, designed with modern amenities and a touch of classic style, creating a comfortable and luxurious environment 🛌🛋️. You can expect attentive service from the staff, who strive to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience for every guest 😊👋. The hotel often includes amenities such as a fitness center, dining options, and business facilities, catering to both leisure and business travelers 🏋️‍♂️🍽️💼.

However, sometimes the “chancery” part of the name might lead you to expect a grand, diplomatic affair, with ambassadors and dignitaries sipping champagne in the lobby 🥂👑. In reality, it’s more like a well-dressed business traveler’s haven, where you’re more likely to find someone quietly working on a laptop than negotiating international treaties 💻🌍. The hotel aims for a polished and professional atmosphere, which can sometimes feel a bit… reserved. Think of it as the well-mannered cousin who always remembers to send a thank-you note, but maybe forgets to tell a joke 📝😄.

Overall, The Chancery Hotel offers a solid and reliable stay, with a focus on comfort and convenience. It may not be the most exciting or quirky hotel in town, but it delivers on its promise of a refined and pleasant experience. If you're looking for a dependable and well-maintained hotel, The Chancery is a safe bet.

text.text:
A Luxurious and Welcoming Stay at The Chancery Hotel, Bengaluru!

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Chancery Hotel in Bengaluru for a night, and it was an unforgettable experience that exceeded all my expectations as a solo traveler. From the moment I called to inquire about an early check-in, I knew I was in good hands.

Miss Kalra, the staff member I spoke to, was incredibly helpful and promptly confirmed my early check-in request, setting the tone for a fantastic stay. Upon arrival, I was warmly greeted by Happy and Sakshi at the front desk reception. To my delight, they not only accommodated my early arrival but also surprised me with an upgrade to a Premium category room - the highlight of my entire stay!

The room was simply stunning, boasting a modern and chic design with plenty of space to relax and unwind. The Japanese toilet and bathtub were unexpected delights that added an extra touch of luxury to my experience. The sleep quality was nothing short of exceptional, surpassing even some of the most renowned 5-star properties I've visited before.

Each morning, I enjoyed a delectable breakfast spread with a wide variety of Indian and continental cuisine options. The choices were plentiful and delicious, catering to different tastes and preferences.

Overall, I cannot speak highly enough about The Chancery Hotel. The staff's exceptional service, from Miss Kalra's assistance over the phone to the warm reception from Happy and Sakshi, made me feel valued and welcome throughout my stay. The room's elegance and the incredible sleep quality left a lasting impression on me.

Without a doubt, I award The Chancery Hotel a well-deserved 5-star rating. When I return to Bengaluru, I will definitely be choosing this establishment again for another luxurious and memorable stay. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a top-notch experience in the city!

Thank you, The Chancery Hotel, for making my trip so special!

text.text:
I had very bad experience with this hotel. I booked a room for me and my family for 5 night. When we reached the location from abroad and got in the booked room, to our disappointment the bedsheets, pillow covers and comforters looked old, exhausted and were having soiled marks on them. we asked for replacement pillow covers and got similar exhausted pillow covers and unfriendly response from the staff. The most distressing part was in the opposite building construction was going on and in the way to the hotel concrete pieces were falling / raining from the top of that building onto a plastic sheet which was placed on the way to the hotel. We felt very unsafe by this and stayed for one night. I quickly found a far better hotel of high modern standards and superb hygiene and quickly checked out from this low grade hotel.

Another interesting part was I got a call from the Trebo representative asking why I didn't complete my stay for which I booked , I gave them the explanation. They regretted and told they will refund the amount of the stay. I told them ok, whatever... Now it's like 5 days or more after that call... No refund... just dialogues. Waste hotel... Dont select such horrible hotels which is a waste of time and money. They cant even take care of their bedsheets and pillow covers... not to mention the SAFETY OF THEIR CUSTOMERS. originalText.text:
I had very bad experience with this hotel. I booked a room for me and my family for 5 night. When we reached the location from abroad and got in the booked room, to our disappointment the bedsheets, pillow covers and comforters looked old, exhausted and were having soiled marks on them. we asked for replacement pillow covers and got similar exhausted pillow covers and unfriendly response from the staff. The most distressing part was in the opposite building construction was going on and in the way to the hotel concrete pieces were falling / raining from the top of that building onto a plastic sheet which was placed on the way to the hotel. We felt very unsafe by this and stayed for one night. I quickly found a far better hotel of high modern standards and superb hygiene and quickly checked out from this low grade hotel.

Another interesting part was I got a call from the Trebo representative asking why I didn't complete my stay for which I booked , I gave them the explanation. They regretted and told they will refund the amount of the stay. I told them ok, whatever... Now it's like 5 days or more after that call... No refund... just dialogues. Waste hotel... Dont select such horrible hotels which is a waste of time and money. They cant even take care of their bedsheets and pillow covers... not to mention the SAFETY OF THEIR CUSTOMERS. They post photos of their hotels and rooms when they started the hotel and deceive the customers.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Apple Treebo Villa and had a mixed experience. The room itself was clean, and the interior had a pleasant and modern look, which made the stay comfortable. However, a few issues affected the overall experience.

One of the biggest letdowns was the bathroom towel—it was stained and didn’t look fresh, which was quite disappointing. Additionally, the in-room amenities were not up to the expected standard. The locker was locked upon arrival, making it unusable, and the fridge was not working, which was inconvenient.

Another downside was the complementary breakfast. It did not meet expectations in terms of quality and variety, making it feel below par for the price paid.

Overall, while the room's cleanliness and ambiance were positives, the lack of attention to detail in housekeeping and amenities left room for improvement. If these issues are addressed, it could be a much better stay.

text.text:
Nahar's Heritage Hotel, Ashok Nagar, Bangalore is one of the most exquisite and lavish wedding venues available amongst the posh locals. Its ideally suited for all your intimate gatherings, small scale weddings, corporate events, pre-wedding ceremonies, rituals and much more. Nahar's Heritage Hotel, Ashok Nagar has an exquisite ambiance and will make you feel more special and make your day remarkable. The classy elegance and authentic vibe of the venue gives a magical touch and feel to your occasion.
Plush seating arrangements along with other required materials can be outsourced personally for the décor you desire. The Nahar's Heritage Hotel Bangalore takes care of all your catering qualms into their hands and strives to serve you top-notch multi-cuisine delectable in both vegetarian and non-vegetarian variants. The venue has a very inviting and pleasing ambiance which makes everyone feel welcomed. Book your special day with Nahar's Heritage Hotel, Ashok Nagar, Bangalore and celebrate an experience unparalleled to the imaginative eye.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The hotel provides certain units that include a safety deposit box, and every room comes with a private bathroom and a wardrobe. At Nahar Heritage Hotel, all rooms have a seating area.

The accommodation offers a buffet or vegetarian breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Nahar Heritage Hotel include Cubbon Park, Chinnaswamy Stadium and Kanteerava Indoor Stadium. The nearest airport is Kempegowda International Airport, 33 km from the hotel.

text.text:
The Leela Palace Bengaluru is an extraordinary blend of opulence and modernity, truly living up to its reputation as Garden City’s only modern palace hotel. From the moment you arrive, you’re greeted by an ambiance of grandeur and elegance, with stunning architecture and lush greenery that make you feel like royalty.

The rooms are impeccably designed, combining modern comforts with regal charm. Every detail, from the plush furnishings to the luxurious amenities, reflects unparalleled attention to quality and guest satisfaction.

Dining at The Leela Palace is a feast for the senses. The restaurants offer an exceptional variety of cuisines, each crafted to perfection. Whether it’s an indulgent breakfast spread or a fine-dining experience, the culinary standards are simply world-class.

The serene gardens, tranquil pool, and indulgent spa provide a perfect escape from the bustling city, making it a haven of relaxation. The service is outstanding – every staff member goes above and beyond to ensure your stay is nothing short of perfect.

For those seeking luxury, comfort, and a touch of royalty in the heart of Bengaluru, The Leela Palace is truly unmatched. An unforgettable experience.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Leela Palace Bangalore, and it was an unforgettable experience from start to finish. This hotel epitomizes luxury, offering a perfect blend of opulence, great cuisine, and exceptional service.

The moment I stepped into the hotel, I was captivated by its elegant and sophisticated decor. The rooms are beautifully designed with high-end furnishings and modern amenities, ensuring maximum comfort and relaxation. The attention to detail in the design and the cleanliness of the property is truly impressive. To think that a property as old as this is maintained so well is commendable.

The food is nothing short of spectacular. The diverse menu features a wide array of delectable dishes, each prepared with the finest ingredients. Whether it was the sumptuous breakfast buffet or the in-room dining, every meal was a culinary delight. The presentation and flavors were top-notch, making dining here a memorable experience.

What truly sets The Leela Palace apart is the outstanding service. The staff is incredibly attentive, professional, and friendly. From the warm welcome at check-in to the personalized attention throughout my stay, every interaction was marked by genuine hospitality. The team went above and beyond to ensure that all my needs were met, including extending my check-out as much as possible and that I felt pampered throughout my visit.

I highly recommend this hotel and look forward to returning in the future.

text.text:
Pros

Clean and neat rooms

I am very pleased with the cleanliness of the bathroom

A superior quality body wash, hand wash, and shampoo were provided

Rooms are very quiet and calm. There is no street noise.

Cons:

There is no hospitality or helping disposition on the part of the staff. The service provided is very poor.

In my opinion, the wireless internet at this hotel is pathetic. There are frequent disconnections and the speed is slow. If you are working at home, avoid the hotel because the mobile internet signal is too weak inside the room.

The breakfast has a very limited number of spreads, so there is no reason to spend more money on breakfast.

The hotel staff is friendly and responsive, contributing to a positive experience. The location is truly one of its best features. The rooms are well-equipped, and the bathrooms are decent, always providing hot water.
